ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 36 LEDs IR Illuminators. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation.Minimum Illumination: 0.0 lux
Image Sensor: CMOS. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV Lines. Signal System: NTSC standard
Built-in 6mm Lens and mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Metal body housing, mount and sun shade. Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application
Package includes: 1 x CMOS Bullet Camera, 1 x Metal Bracket, 1 x 12V DC 500mA Power Supply and 1 x security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Bullet Security Camera Outdoor Day Night CCTV Surveillance 520TVL 36 Infrared LEDs IR Cut Filter for DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Bonus Security Warning Sticker C2P
